title: Newcastle United v Barcelona: Champions League – live
summary: Eddie Howe's team faces a significant challenge as they kick off their campaign against Barcelona. Barry Glendenning will provide minute-by-minute updates on the match. Fans can expect detailed coverage as the game unfolds.

title: Jimmy Kimmel suspension: Trump suggests networks who cover him ‘negatively’ could lose licenses – live
summary: President Trump claimed on Air Force One that 97% of news networks are biased against him, lacking supporting evidence. In response, Senate Majority Leader Chuck Schumer accused Trump of attempting to suppress free speech. The exchange highlights ongoing tensions between the administration and the media.

title: Cost of private psychology soars in UK as practitioners turn away clients
summary: Prices for psychological services have surged by 34% since 2022. As a result, 29% of psychologists are turning away new patients. This trend highlights growing accessibility issues in mental health care.

title: Manchester City v Napoli: Champions League – live
summary: Italian champions arrive at the Etihad for a highly anticipated match. Simon Burnton provides live updates and minute-by-minute coverage. Fans eagerly await the unfolding action between the two teams.

title: Anna Friel tells court of ordeal as stalker given 15-year restraining order
summary: Phil Appleton, 71, has been placed under a court order prohibiting him from contacting a specific actor. The order also restricts him from entering certain designated areas. This decision follows concerns regarding his behavior towards the actor.
